Name: Fur Frenzy
Description: Deal 2 damage. If you have no cards in hand, also deal 1 damage to each other enemy.

Name: Nut Assault
Description: Deal X damage divided as you choose among any number of enemies, where X is half the number of cards on your field, rounded up.
